docs.title: API
docs.text:
Welcome to the documentation for the Dataset Packaging Service.

This service provides an API for grouping a larger set of datasets into a smaller, useful combination of datasets.

docs.title: POST /dataset-packaging/recommend/
docs.text:
Recommend a package

Description

Recommend K datasets based on a given set of dataset IDs.

Request body

application/json 

{
    "ids": [
        "10009060-1",
        "10003341-1",
        "10007969-1",
        "10006688-1",
        "1000136-2",
        "10000971-1",
        "10003856-1",
        "10003732-2",
        "10009168-1",
        "100074-1",
        "10002240-5"
    ]
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the request body 
{
    "properties": {
        "ids": {
            "items": {
                "type": "string"
            },
            "type": "array",
            "uniqueItems": true,
            "title": "Ids",
            "description": "Set of dataset IDs to base recommendations on"
        },
        "k": {
            "type": "integer",
            "exclusiveMinimum": 1.0,
            "title": "K",
            "description": "Number of recommendations to return",
            "default": 5
        }
    },
    "type": "object",
    "required": [
        "ids"
    ],
    "title": "RecommendRequest",
    "example": {
        "ids": [
            "10009060-1",
            "10003341-1",
            "10007969-1",
            "10006688-1",
            "1000136-2",
            "10000971-1",
            "10003856-1",
            "10003732-2",
            "10009168-1",
            "100074-1",
            "10002240-5"
        ]
    }
}

Response 200 OK

application/json 

{
    "recommendations": [
        "10009060-1",
        "10000971-1",
        "10007969-1",
        "10003856-1",
        "10006688-1"
    ]
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the response body 
{
    "properties": {
        "recommendations": {
            "items": {
                "type": "string"
            },
            "type": "array",
            "title": "Recommendations",
            "description": "List of recommended dataset IDs"
        }
    },
    "type": "object",
    "required": [
        "recommendations"
    ],
    "title": "RecommendationsResponse",
    "example": {
        "recommendations": [
            "10009060-1",
            "10000971-1",
            "10007969-1",
            "10003856-1",
            "10006688-1"
        ]
    }
}

Response 422 Unprocessable Content

application/json 

{
    "detail": [
        {
            "loc": [
                null
            ],
            "msg": "string",
            "type": "string"
        }
    ]
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the response body 
{
    "properties": {
        "detail": {
            "items": {
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/ValidationError"
            },
            "type": "array",
            "title": "Detail"
        }
    },
    "type": "object",
    "title": "HTTPValidationError"
}

docs.title: GET /dataset-packaging/add-dataset/
docs.text:
Add Dataset

Description

Add the dataset with the specified ID to the internal database.

Input parameters

Parameter In Type Default Nullable Description id query string No

Response 200 OK

application/json Schema of the response body

Response 422 Unprocessable Content

application/json 

{
    "detail": [
        {
            "loc": [
                null
            ],
            "msg": "string",
            "type": "string"
        }
    ]
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the response body 
{
    "properties": {
        "detail": {
            "items": {
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/ValidationError"
            },
            "type": "array",
            "title": "Detail"
        }
    },
    "type": "object",
    "title": "HTTPValidationError"
}

docs.title: GET /dataset-packaging/check-datasets/
docs.text:
Check Datasets

Description

Check for missing datasets in the database.

Input parameters

Parameter In Type Default Nullable Description insert query boolean False No

Response 200 OK

application/json Schema of the response body

Response 422 Unprocessable Content

application/json 

{
    "detail": [
        {
            "loc": [
                null
            ],
            "msg": "string",
            "type": "string"
        }
    ]
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the response body 
{
    "properties": {
        "detail": {
            "items": {
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/ValidationError"
            },
            "type": "array",
            "title": "Detail"
        }
    },
    "type": "object",
    "title": "HTTPValidationError"
}

docs.title: GET /dataset-packaging/health/

Health Check

Description

Check the health of the Dataset Packaging API.

application/json Schema of the response body

docs.title: GET /dataset-packaging/
docs.text:
Root Endpoint

Description

Root endpoint to verify that the Dataset Packaging API is running.

docs.title: Third-Party Licenses
docs.text: The Dataset Packaging service uses several third-party libraries, each with its own license. The major dependencies and their licenses are listed below:

docs.title: Python Libraries
docs.text: Library License numpy BSD License FastAPI MIT License loguru MIT License pandas BSD 3-Clause License pydantic-settings MIT License KeyBERT MIT License polars MIT License httpx BSD License Uvicorn BSD 3-Clause License

docs.title: Citing Dataset Packaging
docs.text:
If you use the Dataset Packaging service in your research, please cite it as follows:

DataGEMS EOSC. (2025). Dataset Packaging. GitHub. https://github.com/datagems-eosc/dataset-packaging

BibTeX:

@software{dataset-packaging,
  author = {{DataGEMS EOSC}},
  title = {Dataset Packaging},
  year = {2025},
  publisher = {GitHub},
  url = {https://github.com/datagems-eosc/dataset-packaging}
}

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
For questions regarding the license or usage of the Dataset Packaging service, please contact:

  • Email: contact@datagems.eu
